name: Dragon Z：Energy Origin
description:
Almost 100 fighters available in Budokai! Experience exciting battles and cool skills and exceed your limit!
Develop your own fighters in multiple aspects!

Fight all the strong ones for glory in Budokai!

● Multiverse: occupy the universe you like and build your own force!

● Powerful fighters: build your strongest team in multiple aspects and enjoy the fights!

● Pinnacle rivals: Budokai Elite Tournament has come online. Fight to become the last winner!
